choices.D: Sessions handled by proxy-based security profiles cannot be synchronized.
choices.A: Virtual clustering can be configured between two FortiGate devices that have multiple VDOMs.
choices.B: HA management interface settings are synchronized between cluster members.
choices.C: Heartbeat interfaces are not required on the primary device.

questions.question_text: Which two statements about HA for FortiGate devices are true? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: A & D are correct - FGT_Infrastructure-6.2, p.305, p.317

questions.question_text: How can you block or allow access to Twitter using a firewall policy?

choices.C: Configure the Action field as Learn and select Twitter.
choices.D: Configure the Destination field as Internet Service objects for Twitter.
choices.B: Configure the Source field as Internet Service objects for Twitter
choices.A: Configure the Service field as Internet Service objects for Twitter.

choices.B: FortiGate downloads IPS updates using UDP port 53 or 8888.
choices.C: Antivirus signatures are downloaded locally on FortiGate.
choices.A: The web filtering database is downloaded locally on FortiGate.
choices.D: FortiAnalyzer can be configured as a local FDN to provide antivirus and IPS updates.

questions.question_text: Which statement about FortiGuard services for FortiGate is true?

comments.content: But I am agree, C seems to be the correct answer

discussion.content:
A is wrong : no web filter DB, only live query and some caching
B is wrong : that's Web filtering which is using these ports to query fortiguard
D could be true, ref : https://docs.fortinet.com/document/fortimanager/6.0.6/administration-guide/931702/settings

choices.B: FortiGate queries the LDAP server for credentials.
choices.D: FortiGate regenerates the algorithm based on the login credentials and compares it to the algorithm stored on the LDAP server.
choices.C: FortiGate sends the user-entered credentials to the LDAP server for authentication.
choices.A: FortiGate queries its own database for credentials.

questions.question_text: How does FortiGate verify the login credentials of a remote LDAP user?
When using SD-WAN, how must you configure a next-hop gateway address for a member interface, so that FortiGate can forward Internet traffic?

choices.C: It must be configured in a static route using the sdwan virtual interface.
choices.D: It must be provided in the SD-WAN member interface configuration.
choices.B: It must be learned automatically through a dynamic routing protocol.
choices.A: It must be configured in a policy route using the sdwan virtual interface.
